General.Name: Jayshree Tea & Industries Limited
General.Description: Jay Shree Tea & Industries Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of tea in India and internationally. It operates through Tea, Sugar, and Chemicals and Fertilizer segments. The company is also involved in the manufacture and market of sugar; and production of chemicals and fertilizers, such as sulphuric acid and oleum, as well as single super phosphate offered under the Annapurna brand. In addition, it offers warehousing services, as well as engages in the non-banking financial activities. The company was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Kolkata, India.
